#summary GEWebBrowser control notes
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The main control that holds the Google Earth Plug-in. 

= Details =

The GEWebBrowser inherits from the standard [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.forms.webbrowser.aspx System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser] control class and has the same base members, methods, properties and events. 

The GEWebBrowser control cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8skskf63.aspx Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code]

== Public Methods ==

GetPlugin()<br>
Get the plugin instance associated with the control<br>
*Return Value:* The plugin instance

LoadPlugin()<br>
Load the embeded html document into the browser<br>

LoadKml(System.String)<br>
Load a kml/kmz file This function requires a 'twin' LoadKml function in javascript this twin function will call "google.earth.fetchKml" <br>
*Parameters*<br>
url: path to a kml/kmz file<br>

InjectJavascript(System.String)<br>
Inject a javascript element into the document head <br>
*Parameters*<br>
javascript: the script code<br>

InvokeJavascript(System.String)<br>
Executes a script function defined in the currently loaded document.<br>
*Parameters*<br>
function: The name of the function to invoke<br>
*Return Value:* The result of the evaluated function<br>

InvokeJavascript(System.String,System.Object[])<br>
Executes a script function that is defined in the currently loaded document. <br>
*Parameters*<br>
function: The name of the function to invoke<br>
args: any arguments<br>
*Return Value:* The result of the evaluated function<br>

ScreenGrab()<br>
Take a 'screen grab' of the current GEWebBrowser view <br>
*Return Value:* bitmap image<br>

OnPluginReady(System.Object,FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEEventArgs)<br>
Protected method for raising the PluginReady event <br>
*Parameters*<br>
plugin: The plugin object<br>
e: Event arguments<br>

OnKmlLoaded(System.Object,FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEEventArgs)<br>
Protected method for raising the KmlLoaded event <br>
*Parameters*<br>
kmlObject: The kmlObject object<br>
e: Event arguments<br>

OnScriptError(System.Object,FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEEventArgs)<br>
Protected method for raising the ScriptError event <br>
*Parameters*<br>
sender: The sending object<br>
e: Event arguments<br>

External_ScriptError(System.Object,FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEEventArgs)<br>
Called when the document has a ScriptError <br>
*Parameters*<br>
sender: The sending object<br>
e: Event arguments<br>

External_PluginReady(System.Object,FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEEventArgs)<br>
Called when the Plugin is Ready <br>
*Parameters*<br>
plugin: The plugin instance<br>
e: Event arguments<br>

External_KmlLoaded(System.Object,FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEEventArgs)<br>
Called when a Kml/Kmz file has loaded <br>
*Parameters*<br>
kmlFeature: The kml feature<br>
e: Event arguments<br>

GEWebBrowser_DocumentCompleted(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventArgs)<br>
Called when the Html document has finished loading <br>
*Parameters*<br>
sender: The sending object<br>
e: Event arguments<br>

Window_Error(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementErrorEventArgs)<br>
Called when there is a script error in the window <br>
*Parameters*<br>
sender: The sending object<br>
e: Event arguments<br>
